formdata.value: The peach cotton silk garba special chaniya choli is a vibrant and graceful ensemble, enhanced with sequins, cutadana, beads, mirror, cowrie shells and gota work. The charming choli features a sleeveless pattern, comes with a dupatta. The print and work may slightly vary from the image.

{"fabric":"Cotton Silk","washCare":"dry clean only","work":"Cutdana, Sequins, Beads, Mirror, Gota, shells","manufacturingDetails":"Akshya Nagar 1st Block 1st Cross,Rammurthy nagar,Bangalore 560016","color":"Red","occasion":"Navratri","countryOrigin":"India"}
